name: Just Dance 2017®
description: Just Dance® 2017 is more fun to play than ever! Grab your friends and family and start dancing anytime, anywhere, with anyone on Nintendo Switch™. Be sure to keep the party going with the included three-month trial of Just Dance® Unlimited, giving you access to an online catalog with 300+ of your favorite Just Dance tracks!
ratingContent: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB.
